body:
While I do not see that this is somehow related to Radiance, I think
that dxf is simply a problematic format for model exchange. There are
standards such as iges, step for cad, and for models/scenes vrml, x3d
usually work well. dxf is a propietary format by Autodesk, they change
it at will, do not expect other software to be able to support it perfectly.

To import (subset) dxf into radiance, there are several translators, but
obj is better supported now.

CU Lars.
subject: [Radiance-general] Problem Importing DXF into Maya on Mac OSX
